text: Thomas Ingram (died after 1434), of Shere, Surrey, was an English politician, landowner and member of the gentry. ==Family== Nothing is recorded of his family. ==Career== He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Guildford in 1415.http://www.historyofparliamentonline.org/volume/1386-1421/member/ingram- thomas ==References== Category:14th-century births Category:15th-century deaths Category:English MPs 1415 Category:People from Surrey Category:Members of Parliament for Guildford
title: Thomas Ingram (fl. 1415)
